website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive goalkeeping gloves that don't compromise on quality.
pros: For low-priced goalkeeping gloves, we were surprised at how much finger support these gloves have
The materials are comfortable and breathe well
The grip and flexibility are on par with many of their more expensive competitors
cons: The gloves fit true to size for the most part, but we found the thumb to be disproportionately large

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have been surprisingly good quality! Getting finger protection at this price seemed to good to be true but the grip has been holding up really well over the first month that I have had them. I played keeper in college (years ago) and they feel a lot like Uhlsport gloves I used to use. If they only hold up for one season of rec soccer they will still be a tremendous value. As with any gloves, you should avoid exposing the latex to your sweat as the oil from your skin deteriorates the grip more quickly. I try to keep mine in the bag they came in as well. All in all these have been fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: The Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Easily best goalie gloves we have tried, they make a huge difference, they fit to size as they should are sturdy giving great support are easier to get in and off for my 9yr old daughter as well and are super well priced we just got our second pair thank you Blok-it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great goalie gloves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves for my 9 year old grandson. They're a little tough for him to get them on when he's sweating, but the grip these gloves give him is excellent. He loves them and hasn't lost a game while wearing them. I had to revise this review from 5 stars to 2. The Velcro on the gloves will not hold the glove straps after only a couple months of indoor use. My grandson liked the gloves when he first got them, but the velcro wore out after a very short time and now the straps won't stay fastened. I'll have to see if the gloves can be repaired with some new velcro.
customer_reviews.author: V. SALVIA

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Used about 5 indoor games so far and no wear on the palms yet. Comfortable and decent grip. Finger protection is OK, not the strongest, but not bad. These are not $100 gloves, but did not pay that much so very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dangyankees

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my indoor rec league. I've used them in about 5 games so far and they are getting a slight bit of wear on the fingertips, but that's to be expected. As for sizing goes, I wish I would have ordered a size down according to the measurements guide. I previously had some size 9's in the Adidas practice gloves that fit great. I went with the recommended sizing guide (found online) and according to the measurements I took I ordered 10s. They fit fine in the palms but the fingers are a bit long. Although, I do have some very wide palms...
customer_reviews.author: MGD

customer_reviews.title: Our Cost Conscious Favorites!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have gone through 2 pairs each of these lasting over 4 seasons for each of us. I've had plenty of gloves that are worn out halfway through 1 season. They also have good grip and respond well to a spray of goalie glue. The fingers are not finger save tech but they do a fair job of preventing finger jams. Get a size larger than you think as the wrist area is small when putting your hands into the glove. Best of all is what you get for the price, fantastic value!
customer_reviews.author: St. Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, will recommend
customer_reviews.text: Use it tonight for the first time... was able to securely hold on to the ball many times. Used to use Adidas Predator training gloves, were able to made saves but lots of rebounds. This glove was able to stop the ball and adsorb most of the impact and falls right in front of me. This gloves also has finger saves which was not mentioned in the description. Great Value, will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Wong

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like these AT ALL at first
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like these AT ALL at first. They were way too rigid, and the description didn't say they have finger protection (which I did not want). However, after a few games with these, I'm actually really happy with them. The finger protection becomes less rigid after a few uses, and they help keep the ball out on those "fingertip" saves.
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these gloves several times over for recreational use in my indoor adult soccer leagues. I play 3x a week and each set will last me several months (with good care). The finger supports are fine, not too soft and not too firm. The Velcro surrounding the wrist is great and maintains form. I'll be ordering this again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Eemon Amini

customer_reviews.title: If you play for serious or fun
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves - Although, I have not used it even once as a goalie, my goalkeepers, love it. Great price - honestly, gloves should not cost a bunch - this is good product at the right price for me - not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Saywhat?!

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh wasn’t impressed
customer_reviews.text: These started falling apart pretty quick. I didn’t expect them to last forever... but I did expect theM to last longer than the ones we bought for half the price and they didn’t. Plus they fit odd. The Openings are very small
customer_reviews.author: Mikegezz

customer_reviews.title: Best product in this price range....competes with more expensive
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat them for the price. My goalie is U9 and needed more support in the wrist and fingers than the average "cheap $10 specials" that are mainly Wal-Mart gloves with a bit of velcro. These aren't $100 steel inserts you'd buy a serious college-club player but are a major step up from the aforementioned.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jason Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great protection! Wish they were cheaper though...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gloves. Whenever I order them, they are shipped to me quick and easy. but they are a bit pricey. kinda wish there was such a thing as sponsorships so I could get free gloves ever few months, because the only bad thing about these is that the palms break really quickly when I play my team games. I get a lot of use out of them, but its hard shelling out $30 every other month to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this
customer_reviews.text: Definitely do not get it! 1. The design is not well balanced as it fits from fingers but wrist is really loose. 2. I had only one game tonight and the material has ALREADY started to come off. Listen to me and do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Ally Walker

customer_reviews.title: The palms are soft and are pretty sticky. Seems like they'll wear fine as long ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 10 (almost 11) y.o. well and he likes them. We did measure his hand around knuckles as described (I believe that translated into a size 7). The palms are soft and are pretty sticky. Seems like they'll wear fine as long as he only uses them to catch/block the soccer ball. These do have stiffeners to keep fingers from bending backwards.
customer_reviews.author: marlin_spike

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves as kids really start to play goalie
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves for the price. They have thick durable padding and a hard back for finger protection. As kids get older and hit harder shots, it is important for goalies to wear real gloves. The drawback is that they do require a bit of hand strength to use properly. I have a few sizes for teams that I coach. The kids on my 10 and 11-year-old team love them. The kids on my 8 and 9-year-old team are mixed for whether their hands are strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: William E Poorbaugh Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grip - ball sticks like glue
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip - ball sticks like glue. Padding is great and no issues with unexpected wear - used outdoors on grass and turf; have not used indoors. Sized right and very comfortable. Only suggestion might be to make it more breathable, but I don't know how they would do that without interfering with the integrity of the glove. Shipping arrived at expected time. No issues at all with anything with this purchase - I feel you can buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Setanta

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are very comfortable and have great grip
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are very comfortable and have great grip. After 4 games they are starting to see a little wear but that to be expected. I will definitely keep purchasing gloves from this company. UPDATE: I have used the gloves a total of 7 games and the plastic in the finger guards now rubs against my knuckles causing bloody knuckles. I still like the gloves i will just have to tape my fingers now.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Already ripping
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the gloves are already ripping and he has only been playing for a month. He does play on turf more than grass which I know is harder on everything but I would think the gloves would at least hold out through the season. We will be shopping for new gloves elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K.R. Beckler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for u10
customer_reviews.text: For the price and durability, these are perfect for my son who is playing u10. Grip is excellent and it arrived on time with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great protection. So far they are holding great. They also look very nice. I’m not sure about durability because I haven’t used them that long but I can say they seem to be built tough.
customer_reviews.author: FranciscoV

customer_reviews.title: To me right now not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro closure on one glove came off before my grandson could even wear the gloves. My daughter through the paperwork away before he tried them on. Now I can't even return the defective gloves. So I just ordered a new pair but I'm out $31.97 from the first pair. He should receive his new gloves Thursday Oct 1,2020 and he has a game Saturday Oct 3,2020. I hope he gets to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne R.

customer_reviews.title: Good hand protection but less durable
customer_reviews.text: The strap around the writs came off fairly quickly, as the stitching was not as good. Gloves are good though and protects hand.
customer_reviews.author: SKG

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious if you’re looking for gloves
customer_reviews.text: they were too big, and they did not have any grip when trying to keep the ball in your hands. I used these when I was practicing or playing in a game and the only time the other team would be able to score was when i had these gloves on because whenever I wanted to do a diving save, the gloves made it nearly impossible to hold onto and i could barely even make a fist to punch out the ball if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Miah

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid gloves for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid gloves for a very reasonable price. I play goalie two nights per week in a pretty competitive league and I get lots action. Even with that much playing time, the gloves still held up for close to 6 months. Great purchase and I'll continue buying these as I go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glove..Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Very well made gloves and very quick to ship and recieved exactly what I asked for. Would recommend Seller to anyone who wants quick and accurate orders. Gloves have been used through 2 tournaments and about 10 games through wet and dry games holding up. Recommend Goalie Glove soap as normal soap is too abrasive for the padding of glove. Sizes tend to run big so always double check with sizing chart first.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked them enough to buy a second pair recently
customer_reviews.text: I wore them once a week for about a year. Eventually the foam from the fingertips got wore down (i'm a decent goalie...ha. ha.). I liked them enough to buy a second pair recently.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Quality performance, subpar durability.
customer_reviews.text: Grip, range of motion, and finger protection are excellent to say the least. Gloves fit true to size, and there is no doubt that you will love these gloves at first use. Only problem is that they have little to no durability. If you're looking to use these gloves for a short intramural season away at college or a sand soccer tournament one weekend you can't get a better bang for your buck, but if you are looking for longevity (longer than 2-3 months) you should consider other options because mine began to tear after about 15 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. We tried on several different goalie gloves for my 11 year old, 5'3" daughter, and finally found a perfect fit with these in a youth size 7. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: good affordable fingertip protection for keepers :)
customer_reviews.text: Good affordable gloves. Really good finger tip protection. I used to jam my fingers on a regular basis; I haven't since using these gloves. These gloves last me 1-2 seasons of pretty heavy play. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Stitching not so great
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter says these gloves are comfortable, we have had them for 2 months now and the stitching has already came apart by the thumb
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not well constructed
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these, they fit great and seemed to be well made. However, after his first game the foam is coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my second pair. Easy on and off, even after a full game. Fingers are now reinforced with a wider splint.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy them again
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of gloves. My daughter really likes using them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: I bought these gloves for my 10 yr old grandson ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my 10 yr old grandson as a Christmas gift. So far, they're holding well after extensive usage. The padding is thick enough to protect his hands while stopping hard shot balls. 5 tars.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinto gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Will probably buy the same ones when the time comes. Quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MommyRN

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortability along with great attention to finger and wrist support for maximum security
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to use them in a soccer league on my university. I’m an international student, and since I would not use them for more than five months, I still wanted gloves where security and comfortability was highly prioritized. These gloves has to be the best bang for your buck, I have used them for three matches now, and we have won every single one, one was even with a clean sheet. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Damborg

customer_reviews.title: too rigid for kids. didn't fit my toddler too ...
customer_reviews.text: too rigid for kids. didn't fit my toddler too well, make sure you read the measurements with attention to detail!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Wont hold up they tore after 2 games
customer_reviews.text: These did not hold up just after 2 games they tore, dont waste your money on them just pay the extra for a name brand glove.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fair. They run small.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fair. Started to show wear after one adult indoor soccer game. Hand protection seems above average. Also, the adult XL 11 barely fits my average/typical size male hands.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old loves these
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 8 year old son (size 5) and he gave me the following review: "I love these gloves because they are comfortable and have a good grip!". The next pair I get him will be the same brand. Good price, quality, and true to sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Decent gloves for the price... they don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent gloves for the price...they don't last very long, but honestly, none of the gloves I have tried have lasted for more than a couple of months, so if you are going to have to replace them at that frequency, they might as well be cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Lucky my auntie detected the bad quality stitching before shipping them
customer_reviews.text: They came unstitched on the sides, so it was returned before they sent them to Honduras. Lucky my auntie detected the bad quality stitching before shipping them oversees
customer_reviews.author: Luis Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit true to size (size 9)
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and fit true to size (size 9). The price was excellent for the quality. Regarding durability ....still pending because I've had it for 4 games but holding up very well. Why not five stars? Well, they are not the best but for $48 are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gramajo

customer_reviews.title: Goalkeeper gloves
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit well and grip was great...for the first game. Foam started peeling off after 1st game. During 2nd game, gloves looked like they have been through 3 seasons. Returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: fairly good
customer_reviews.text: The gloves have good padding, and the sizes fit exactly as descripted. One thing, that can a drawback, they might be a bit slippier than what I expected them to be. All in all, a very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: yazan hejazin

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Keeper gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good grip and well made great wrist strap my 7 year old grand son loves them, for the price is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro V. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Did not last 3 games
customer_reviews.text: These gloves did not last 3 games. I played 3 games in 1 day and the stitching around the Velcro came undone, the palms showed wear, and one of the finger’s plastic guard came out of the finger tip. Better to spend more money and get a glove that will last the season or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: before she settled on these as her favorite. She found these to be the most comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter tried several other pairs, many more expensive ones as well, before she settled on these as her favorite. She found these to be the most comfortable and the most effective. Her grip and control were best with these. We tried 4 other well known pairs as well. She uses them a few times a week and they are holding up as expected for GK gloves. Will be buying another pair so she has ones for practice and one pair for games.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole

customer_reviews.title: These seem like good durable gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a high school goalie. He likes them and has requested a second pair so he can have one for games and one for practice. Will be purchasing a second pair. These seem like good durable gloves. Thick, padded well, good trip.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them, lasted a club season for two kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them, lasted a club season for two kids and were worn practice and games...kids wish colors were better.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: but so far after a few games the gloves are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: The goalie gloves were exactly as advertised. I bought them as backup incase our normally goalie cannot play with us so they are not used that often, but so far after a few games the gloves are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, better than my Adidas ones that fell apart after ONE rec indoor game. Ridiculous. Anyways i love these gloves. You have a lifer here.
customer_reviews.author: charlytoast

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and made of great quality! Only downside is they get pretty dirty, considering they are white, but that is understandable. Hubby uses them for when he plays recreational soccer. We had bought ones that were Nike, and they were ripping after the 1st use! He says these are comfortable, and I made a good choice in buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction and nice feel for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction and nice feel for the price point. However, what you pay is what you get and after only 2 rec league games, padding on the palm began to crack already. They should last a season or two and are definitely quality for a great price, but don't expect great durability.
customer_reviews.author: pfavor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are Geeat for my 8yr okd who's jjst learning how to be a goalie. The fit is a bit snug at first but we prefer it that way cause they break in nicely! Grip is very very good and the sizing, I found was on point. I read through the reviews and chose a size 6 for my 8yr old. Great product. Would absolutely purchase these again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: JeniLee

customer_reviews.title: The purchase experience was excellent, the item which is very comfortable and useful ...
customer_reviews.text: The purchase experience was excellent, the item which is very comfortable and useful for soccer goal keeping arrived on time. I purchased size-6 for my 10-year old girl and size-10 for myself. Both gloves are of very good quality and expecting to last few years. This is one of the best purchase I made for my girl's soccer practice as we don't have to worry about broken finger during the practices.
customer_reviews.author: Regi Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer goalie gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves and help protect fingers when stepped on or jammed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: My 11yo loves them. They fit his hands really snug and with a dry ball it seems to work well. Just gave them to him on Christmas so haven’t tested on field yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer gloves
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gloves, very comfortable, it fits my 8 year old perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his gloves! They work very well and are sturdy. Of course they got dirty right away but I expected that!
customer_reviews.author: Gridt Vig Find

customer_reviews.title: My daughter really likes her gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gloves for my 7 year old daughters first year. She loves the protection on the fingers. The gloves have been pretty good, not much wear on them after the first season of AYSO and Club games and practice. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gera

customer_reviews.title: Great Goalie glove at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Blok-IT gloves quickly and my players loved these gloves. A great price for a good quality glove. I expect to get a lot of use out of this product in the near future. Please buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, good protection.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, good protection. I bought these for my 9 year old daughter. She has been practicing with them regularly with no complaints. She's still growing so we were looking for gloves that were of good quality but within a certain price point because she's likely to outgrow them before they wear out. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ondich

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what he likes so much about them but they are great. We have tried all the gloves from cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is a U12 keeper and will only wear these gloves. I don't know what he likes so much about them but they are great. We have tried all the gloves from cheap to super expensive. These are affordable and at his age and the amount of use we get per pair is very reasonable. You may replace these slightly more often but that is ok by us.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Palms wear out fairly quickly, IMO. Otherwise a descent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McAllister

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit as expected, are working well and my husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our middle school soccer program and the gloves seem to be good quality. I do not personally use them or know anything about goalie gloves so I am sorry that I cannot give more information than that. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Cohee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Goalie Gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent padding for the hard shots. Good overall grip. I will need to purchase the next size up as our kids getting bigger.
customer_reviews.author: CalKid1

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for the money, they have good padding and feel good.
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for the money, they have good padding and feel good. I noticed a lot of the reviews on here were for youths, I am an adult with large hands and the size 10 fit me great!!
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: the padding is pretty nice and the feel is good but the stitching ...
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for....the padding is pretty nice and the feel is good but the stitching is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Rengi

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, good protection for hands and goal!
customer_reviews.text: Vents really help reduce that inevitable awful smell that emanates after a few games/training sessions. Son really likes the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son truly enjoys these new gloves. The size is correct and the fingersaver spines are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional gloves for the price. Not sure what everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional gloves for the price. Not sure what everyone is complaining about. Any pair of gloves will lose grip after a few games. That's why there is 5/8" of grip. Would gladly buy another pair after this one expires.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA VO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fast shipping. Much better than other ones we have used
customer_reviews.author: David Mcginley

customer_reviews.title: Seem great so far
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the old gloves my son had. He plays goal for his club team and loves these so far. This weekend is the adidas fall classic tournament I'll update after three or four games.
customer_reviews.author: Damage98

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great all around gloves that are affordable and have held up well for my 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very good gloves for the price, one minor negative thing is the gloves ran slightly small, so if you are borderline purchase the larger option. Other than that they were great. The shipping was very fast and the gloves have very good support for your fingers. Very, very good gloves you should definitely purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lukens

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t even make it through 1 game. Fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: T Riley

customer_reviews.title: These are fine globes to
customer_reviews.text: These are fine globes to. As I have mentioned all keeper gloves are not durable in the palm for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have been saving my son's hands. They are very padded and do reduce the pain from the impact. The children are getting stronger and bigger and he needed more protection.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son for travel soccer. They fit him well and he really likes them. So far, they are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime S

customer_reviews.title: Great pit, good grip
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, good grip. I used them for a couple months of indoor on multiple teams and they wore out. Might work better for outdoor, but the turf tears them up. To be fair, I have yet to find a pair that does hold up on a turf field.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are exactly what my son has been looking for. The perfect blend of support and flexibility, with a great grip.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Andrew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: good stickiness on the palms/fingers without effecting throws
customer_reviews.text: Solid gloves, good stickiness on the palms/fingers without effecting throws. Used them for over a month at multiple games/practices and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Seth G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit also
customer_reviews.text: Protects the fingers A++. Nice fit also. My son is a skilled goalkeeper and he approves your product. Thanks a lot. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: gilberto concepcion

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the feel of the gloves and the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the feel of the gloves and the grab they have when catching the ball. However, the palms are already starting to break down and he's only had them for a month.
customer_reviews.author: runningmom74

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves will continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are great. My daughter plays goalie and after going through many different pairs she likes these the best. Will continue to buy them as long as she plays.
customer_reviews.author: Blackfrost

customer_reviews.title: Protection is great and I will never wear gloves without finger protection ...
customer_reviews.text: Saved my fingers a few times. Protection is great and I will never wear gloves without finger protection again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product-Great
customer_reviews.text: This is 2nd time we have bought them for our adult team. Great product-Great value

customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, it feels very comfortable and it a good quality Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing goalkeeper at their school and these gloves seem to be holding really nice for a change.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Decent gloves for protecting and handling the ball, however ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent gloves for protecting and handling the ball, however the fingers saves were weak and the sizing was a little bit big. Purchased for U12 outdoor, but likely will restrict the use for indoor practice.
customer_reviews.author: HMD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Gloves, but had to return them for size issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They worked absolutely fine with no complaints by my 13 year old
customer_reviews.text: First time for my daughter trying goalie. Gloves were a reasonable price with favorable reviews. They worked absolutely fine with no complaints by my 13 year old. Reason I did not give 5 stars was because I had nothing to compare them to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are good gloves for the
customer_reviews.text: The gloves held up over multiple games. I had no issues with the gloves. They are good gloves for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid goalie gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 pairs for my son over the years. Solid product, better thumb and hand protection.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great goalie gloves
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 8 year old, soccer-loving son and they are perfect! Strong, durable, and well made. He can grip the ball easily and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: JLD

customer_reviews.title: I love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. I used to play with an Under Armor Desafio pair, and these are just as good. Love then
customer_reviews.author: Ems2007

customer_reviews.title: Decent, comfortable, durable enough
customer_reviews.text: They lasted a year and a half of indoor and outdoor soccer. Comfortable but just got destroyed in futsal.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Plantz
